Set in a prime Epping location close to a choice of primary and secondary schools, Westfield Shopping Centre and South Morang train station this spacious and updated four bedroom home has plenty to offer.
Offering a kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plenty of bench and cupboard space, overlooking the sizeable living/meals, second lounge with conara and formal dining room. Master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, updated central bathroom and separate toilet servicing the remaining three bedrooms, plus ducted heated and evaporative cooling for year round comfort.
Set on a 595m2 (approx) block of land it includes an alfresco with decking and a massive covered patio ideal for the entertainer without comprising space for the kids to play in the backyard. Add to this a double lock up garage, workshop, fernery and great size shed all set on landscaped gardens.
Don't delay and inspect this gem today!
